content: Hello! The Master controller is currently offline, which may impact operations. Could you please let me know how I can assist you?
try again to see the master status now
The master controller is currently online.
list all the boxes we have in the warehouse
The warehouse currently has no boxes available.
The available modules are: uarm_01, conveyor_02, container_01, container_02, uarm_02, and dock_01.

if I want to move a box from conveyor_02 to container_02 what is the optimal path to follow??? 
hint: see the modules positions and decide which one is closer
The optimal path is to use uarm_01 to move the box from conveyor_02 to uarm_02, then transfer it to container_02. The path is conveyor_02 → uarm_01 → uarm_02 → container_02.
